Qieyun: 影開二銜入?, 見開二銜入?
English: to press down. to deposit; to mortgage. to sign. to detain in custody
a pearl; a bead. the pupil of the eye
via frontier; a limit: a country

Qieyun: 見開二麻上?, 見開二麻去?

English: to receive respectfully with both hands. to have the honor

Qieyun: 心開一唐入?, 生開三庚入?, 生開二耕入?
English: rope; cord; to bind. to demand
to pledge with wine; to entertain; to repay
to transmit. to summon. to spread (as a disease). to spread

Qieyun: 羣開三B支平?, 見開三B支平?
English: extraordinary; marvellous; wonderful; rare. to admire

Qieyun: 精一模去?, 精開一歌去?, 精開一唐入?
English: to act; to do; to be; to become
to hold in the mouth; to contain

Qieyun: 章開三支平?, 章開三支上?
精開四齊上?, 精開四齊去?
心開一談平?, 心開一談去?
見開二肴去?, 見二江入?
